keyword: how many calories in grape tomatoes
title: How Many Calories in Grape Tomatoes?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in grape tomatoes per 100g, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and more for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Grape Tomatoes?
assumptions: Fresh, raw grape tomatoes; typical small variety (~5-10g each).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of grape tomatoes provide about 18 kcal and 0.9g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil for roasting per 100g
In a salad with 1 tbsp vinaigrette per 100g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g grape tomatoes?
Are grape tomatoes low in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, about 3.9g carbs per 100g, with 1.2g fiber.
